mapper.update: UPDATE video_play_publish SET count = count + 1 WHERE video_id = #{videoId} AND date = #{date}
mapper.select:
SELECT v.id, v.name, v.summary, v.label, vpp.total as count FROM video v LEFT JOIN (select video_id , sum(count) total from video_play_publish group by video_id) vpp ON v.id = vpp.video_id WHERE 1=1
AND v.name LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{name},'%')
AND v.label LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{label},'%')
ORDER BY v.create_time DESC
